name: Mini Worlds
description:
I made this for the GMTK Game Jam, but it just doesn't seem to work on WebGL, but I didn't know that when I tried uploading to the game jam and it ended up, not being playable at all! I'm fine!

DJANVOENMVOIAMVOAMVOAMOCAOCNAIOEPCAJRVJOAIRM CIOERNHO. OU AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHH

Anyway. I think it turned out pretty good either way, so play it and enjoy!

Character Moves with WASD/Arrows and jumps with Spacebar. Worlds can be moved using the mouse
